description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Combi-Tool of the Praetors of Orpheus Chapter. Grants +20 to Tech-Use Tests, also acts as a Common Craftsmanship Auspex and Multikey. Allows user to make Common Lore (Tech) and Forbidden Lre (Archeotech) Tests to discern the function of technology as if they possessed an Intelligence of 50.

Effect: Famed

Notes: 45 R
